mapper.sql: t.ID, t.GROUP_ID, t.ROLE_ID, t.ACCOUNT, t.ACCOUNTNAME, t.PASSWORD, t.MOBILE, t.REMARK, t.AREA, t.DIC_IM_TYPE_KEY, t. DOG_STR, t.PERMISSION_KEY, t.CREATED, t.CREATER, t.UPDATED, t.UPDATER, t.DEL_FLAG, t.PERSON_ID
mapper.select: select , g.name as "group_name" from SYS_ACCOUNT t left join sys_group g on g.id = t.group_id where t.ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ACCOUNT (ID, GROUP_ID, ROLE_ID, ACCOUNT, ACCOUNTNAME, PASSWORD, MOBILE, REMARK, AREA, DIC_IM_TYPE_KEY, DOG_STR, PERMISSION_KEY, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG, PERSON_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicImTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dogStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SYS_ACCOUNT
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNTNAME = #{accountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IM_TYPE_KEY = #{dicImTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOG_STR = #{dogStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERMISSION_KEY = #{permissionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_ACCOUNT set GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNTNAME = #{accountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_IM_TYPE_KEY = #{dicImTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOG_STR = #{dogStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERMISSION_KEY = #{permissionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select , g.name as "group_name" from SYS_ACCOUNT t left join sys_group g on g.id = t.group_id
order by ${orderStr}
